title: He Pours a Full Cup of Salt Down The Drain. The Reason Will Amaze You
cleaned_text:
You may have been unaware of it, but salt has a wide range of uses in your household, from enriching the taste of your dishes to cleaning the snow from your pathway. Medically speaking, when consumed, it retains the water in the body and thus prevents it to dehydrate.

Yet, you need to know that salt is one of the most useful allies in your home, outside of the kitchen. This remarkable common ingredient may help you in numerous different situation in your home.

Salt can be your best friend whenever you need to deal with some daily hassles in the home, like unclogging the bathtub, or cleaning the sink stain, or even removing the iron stickiness.

Salt can help you in numerous other situations and ease your everyday life, but the following 7 are the most interesting and important for you.

A popular channel on YouTube called HouseholdHacker reveals them in the video below:
